result.eng: Some of the money is still left.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágtha
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágthaSome of the money is still left.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead fós fágṫaSome of the money is still left.

result.eng: Who would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ga: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.orig: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sin
result.html: Cé a d'íocfadh airgead ar éadaí a bhí déanta chomh dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?
result.ponchtml: Cé a d'íocfaḋ airgead ar éadaí a ḃí déanta ċoṁ dona sinWho would pay for such badly made clothes?

result.eng: He tells me he has no money.
result.ga: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.orig: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aige
result.html: Deir sé liom nach bhfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.
result.ponchtml: Deir sé liom naċ ḃfuil airgead aigeHe tells me he has no money.

result.eng: The less money they have the better.
result.ga: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.orig: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearr
result.html: Dá laghad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad airgead atá acu is ea is fearrThe less money they have the better.

result.eng: If I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ga: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.orig: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mór
result.html: Dá mbeadh airgead agam cheannóinn teach mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.
result.ponchtml: Dá mbeaḋ airgead agam ċeannóinn teaċ mórIf I had money, I'd buy a big house.

result.eng: No matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ga: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.orig: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.html: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.

result.eng: He is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ga: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.orig: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóirí
result.html: Is státseirbhíseach é - i bhfocail eile tá sé ag maireachtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.
result.ponchtml: Is státseirḃíseaċ é - i ḃfocail eile tá sé ag maireaċtáil ar airgead na gcáiníocóiríHe is a civil servant - in other words, he lives on taxpayers' money.

result.eng: She got no money from me.
result.ga: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.orig: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaim
result.html: Ní bhfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃfuair sí aon airgead uaimShe got no money from me.

result.html: Níl aon airgead agamI have no money.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon airgead agamI have no money.

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ga: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.orig: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliain
result.html: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrtha gach bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.
result.ponchtml: Tá airgead mór á íoc le scéimeanna cultúrṫa gaċ bliainBig money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: I have spent some of the money.
result.ga: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.orig: Tá cuid den airgead caite agam
result.html: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuid den airgead caite agamI have spent some of the money.

result.eng: She has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ga: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.orig: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go póca
result.html: Tá de bhua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeacht ó phóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.
result.ponchtml: Tá de ḃua aici go gcoimeádtar airgead ag imeaċt ó ṗóca go pócaShe has a talent for keeping money flowing from pocket to pocket.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.html: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ponchtml: Le linn na fostaíoċta seo níor íocaḋ aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.

result.eng: She would send money to her family at home.
result.ga: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.orig: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaile
result.html: Chuireadh sí airgead chuig a muintir sa bhaileShe would send money to her family at home.
result.ponchtml: Ċuireaḋ sí airgead ċuig a muintir sa ḃaileShe would send money to her family at home.

result.eng: They gave her some pocket money.
result.html: Thug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad airgead póca diThey gave her some pocket money.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
